title: The Space between words: diplomacy (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.), production company

description: Diplomats choose their words carefully. Everything they say in public commits their government. They need a private place to retreat to for hard bargaining. Diplomats call such bargaining "corridor work". Filmed at the Palais des Nations in Geneva.
